title: ElevonX Introduces Scorpion 2.0 & 4.0 UAV Launch Systems
text:
ElevonX has introduced two new elastic-powered UAV launchers, the Scorpion 2.0 and Scorpion 4.0, designed to enhance the efficiency and...

The post ElevonX Introduces Scorpion 2.0 & 4.0 UAV Launch Systems appeared first on Unmanned Systems Technology.
